attributes.region: '''House Wells''' is a noble house. They are situated in Stoney Sept.==Known Members==*Corlys Wells, a member of the Night's Watch.<ref>"The Sword in the Darkness"</ref>==In the books==In the ''A Song of Ice and Fire'' novels, there are two separate houses that bear the name "House Holt": one from the North and the other from Dorne. The fact that they are situated in Stoney Sept in ''Game of Thrones: A Telltale Games Series'' makes it difficult to determine which one it is intended to be.==See also==*AWOIAF

'''House Wells''' is a noble house. They are situated in [[Stoney Sept]].
sections.Known Members: *[[Corlys Wells]], a member of the [[Night's Watch]].<ref>"[[The Sword in the Darkness]]"</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, there are two separate houses that bear the name "House Holt": one from [[the North]] and the other from [[Dorne]]. The fact that they are situated in [[Stoney Sept]] in ''[[Game of Thrones: A Telltale Games Series]]'' makes it difficult to determine which one it is intended to be.
